name: glslang-zig
description: Glslang ported to the Zig build system.
readme:
[Moved to Codeberg](https://codeberg.org/Games-by-Mason/glslang_zig)

This repository is not mirrored.

releases.name: v1.0.0
releases.body:
This release targets Zig v0.14.0. Thanks for the contributions! :)

## What's Changed
* avoid deprecated C macro API in build script by @andrewrk in https://github.com/Games-by-Mason/glslang-zig/pull/2

## New Contributors
* @andrewrk made their first contribution in https://github.com/Games-by-Mason/glslang-zig/pull/2

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/Games-by-Mason/glslang-zig/commits/v1.0.0
